name: Who is Idiot?
description:
A game has only one purpose: "Be smart, or get trolled"

"Who is Idiot?" is a short mini-game that aim to troll the player.

But the basic concept is to make the player solves a puzzle in a fun way.

Note:
  • This is NOT the final build. 
  • The original plan is publish on Mobile and Desktop.
Issue:
  • The game may have some bugs.
  • Very short.
Q&A:

Q: Why the game so short?

A: Because the  game concept is nearly done.

-

Q: Why not just publish on mobile?

A: Due to my financial problem, I can't afford GMS2(mobile licence).

-

Q: Are you an idiot?

A: Maybe.
